channel.title: Question about the right pserv for me
channel.description:
Alright, here's the situation for me.
I haven't played RS since 2004, but I'd like a nice casual server to mess around on.
I don't mind if there's a lot of PK so long as it isn't 100% PK everywhere. I'm not really too interested in serious PK. I'm really just looking at a nice casual timesink. Rates are irrelevant, I can handle 1x or 100x because it's all based on me just logging on, zoning out a bit, and playing. A lot of the servers I see seem to be very hardcore PK and/or extremely unstable. I'd kinda like to avoid this if such a thing is possible.
Basically, all I want is a server that's online, won't have me PKed out of the wilderness (PK zones are fair game and I'm totally down with that), and isn't so packed with drama that the server will explode in a week. I don't really know anyone in the scene, and I'm okay with underpopulated servers. It would be particularly awesome if it's something a lot of people would vouch for though, a decent community would be great.
I know. Totally casual. Totally not hardcore. Anyone have any suggestions?

item.title: Question about the right pserv for me
item.dc:creator: @OldSkoolRSC OldSkoolRSC
item.description:
@OldSkoolRSC wrote:

Are there enough of us who realize this though. No point in continuing to release servers that target pking griefers, we all know this just results in no pking at all…solution?, screen applicants on the register page;

Question 23; ( as to lure them into a false sense of security by this point )
Is RS2 and Teaming good?
Answer, Yes…BANNED.

If you successfully weeded out the kids, but were left with a much smaller population, you could organize it so the server is only online at a certain time of the day. Id rather jump on a server for an hour, knowing theres going to be what, 15-20 likeminded people? all in the same bracket and pking…then check a server multiple times a day and grow more and more depressed each time.

Random but whatever, i remember seeing on that gingers server, border pkers at lvl 28. So whatd i do, i created the old addy 2h black pure…got insulted so badly…“wdf 10 def ur shit kid” theyd say, “it creates a more interesting fight” id say, “ur a stupid newfag” theyd say, “i enjoy the fight, not the loot” id say…

Read full topic
item.source: Question about the right pserv for me

item.title: Question about the right pserv for me
item.dc:creator: @nacional nacional
item.description:
@nacional wrote:

nah dude, I dislike luke also, but bashing aside. Its been there in kingpk, pirupk, p2ppk, even way back in storkpk to a lesser degree.
But I will agree on luke’s server it’s ridiculous high level pking is ridiculous, I remember I could only go pk at a low lvl if I wanted to have fun
and then that even turned shit.

item.title: Question about the right pserv for me
item.dc:creator: @nacional nacional
item.description:
@nacional wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:8, topic:411559"][quote author=nacional link=topic=512814.msg3723402#msg3723402 date=1314112572]
what oldskool said, the pking is so shit in rsce but it’s not luke’s fault, it’s just a community thing.
[/quote]
This is so true, the whole community is full of trolling kids, it wasnt like this back in RSC.[/quote]

yeah, I don’t mind it at all though. I could care less if someones spams umad over 9000 times.
But what annoys me is the constant teaming, I mean sure in rsc it’s good and everyone did it, but people don’t seem to understand
it’s not the same. Sure go team when on rsc when you had a shitload of teams/clans running around and hundreds of other players in wildy in and out.
But in p servers you have maybe 10-20 max people why would someone team and yet people do this. It just kills pking no matter what server.

item.title: Question about the right pserv for me
item.dc:creator: @OldSkoolRSC OldSkoolRSC
item.description:
@OldSkoolRSC wrote:

RicT:

No worries about glory days. Trying RS2 ruined those plenty,

HAHA

But seriously, im not promoting RSCE, but its really the only server we got. If you want to skill/train/wateva else thats not pking, that server will be perfect for you. If ur after pking then there isnt any, you will see low lvl border pking ( 10 guys or less pretty much all teamed)…then nothing past that unless ur wearing full rune and skulled…then youll see 5 guys log on to kill you then log back out and wild will be dead again.

item.title: Question about the right pserv for me
item.dc:creator: @RicT RicT
item.description:
@RicT wrote:

Well, I don’t mean no PK as in no PK altogether. I just mean if I can’t walk between two towns or mine well outside the wilderness without two or three man PK teams everywhere, I’m not really interested. If it’s border patrol on the wilderness and no hope of getting past without a clan, that’s fine. Just part of the game there.

I’m not horribly well versed on the servers, so I’m not really avoiding anything in particular as far as I know. I’m just asking because I’d just really rather not get comfortable then get tangled up in drama. If RSCE is pretty stable and the PK madness is above the wilderness borderline, it might be worth a shot. No worries about glory days. Trying RS2 ruined those plenty, it’s why I only want to touch RSC. If there’s any other suggestions or support for RSCE, that’ll be my time waster for a while.

Read full topic
item.source: Question about the right pserv for me

item.title: Question about the right pserv for me
item.dc:creator: @OldSkoolRSC OldSkoolRSC
item.description:
@OldSkoolRSC wrote:

I hope you dont mind if theres alot of no pking everywhere.

Btw…what are these servers that you are avoiding.

Theres is only RSCE, RSCR that is dead…a semi pk server in the making…and some replica shit in development.

If i were you, i would stay away from these private servers and leave the glory days untarnished. These private servers will make you very depressed.

If not…then just kill time in RSCE and settle for low lvl teaming border fag shit all day.

Read full topic
